name: 研究方法（一）
restrict: ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習 ◎課程不開放上修
description: This course discuss the process, approaches for designing a quantitative research study in graphic arts communication. Lecturing, group discussions, and oral presentations are employed to achieve the objectives of the course
goals: Understand the process of a scientific research.
Discuss how to write a research report.
Evaluate the quality of a quantitative research.
syllabus:
Upon successful completion of this course, the student will be able to 

1\. Understand the process of a scientific research.

2.   Familiar with quantitative research methods.

3.   Discuss how statistics is used in research.

4.   Evaluate the quality of a quantitative research.

  
Topics are as folloing:  
  
1.Overview  
2.Library searches  
3.The process of research  
4.Selecting a research topic  
5.Develop research questions  
6.Use of the literature  
7.Content analysis  
8.Survey research  
9.Longitudinal research  
10.Experimental research (I)  
11.Experimental research (II)  
12.Sampling (I): Random sampling  
13.Sampling (II): Non-random sampling  
14.**Project presentation and discussion**  
15.**Final Exam**  
  
A student\`s grade will be assigned based on his/her performance and quality on the following works:  
1.Oral presentations,  
2.Assignments,  
3.Term papers  
4.Classroom discussions  
5.Exams, and  
6.Participation
